Category: COSMETIC AND MEDICAL EQUIPMENT AND IMPLEMENTS
Name: Wooden Ointment Pot
Description: Ointment, perfume, and kohl pots and containers were made of different materials, usually nicely formed, but sometimes very simple like this wooden ointment pot. It has a large cover decorated with lotus flowers and a small body with a band filled with sloping lines. The ointment pot was part of the collection found in Qustul and Ballana.
